description.en_US: Dash right through your enemies, damaging everything in your way.
description.de_DE: Fege mitten durch deine Feinde hindurch und schade dabei allen, die du triffst.
description.zh_CN: 从敌人中间冲刺而过，并对其造成伤害。
description.ja_JP: ダッシュで敵を突き抜け、巻き込んだ敵すべてにダメージを与える。
description.ko_KR: 적을 향해 직접 대시하며 가는 길목에 있는 모든 것에 대미지를 입힙니다.
description.zh_TW: 從敵人中間衝刺而過，並對其造成傷害。

description.en_US: Use it to attack the darkness.
description.ja_JP: 闇に対する攻撃として使われる。

THROW_SPECIAL1_B.name: Splitting Cards
THROW_SPECIAL1_B.description: Throw a card that splits in 6!

THROW_SPECIAL2_B.name: Nested Cards
THROW_SPECIAL2_B.description: Throw a card that splits in 6! Twice!

description.en_US: Use it to attack the darkness.

Bring enemies close to then blast away.
